about_the_game:
Verdant Hideout is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music, ambient sounds, and SFX. It includes:

Music
  • Bell Drone
  • Rotten Chimes
  • Tense Atmosphere
  • Wind Curse
  • Haunting Nightmare

Ambience
  • Swamp Frogs

SFX
  • Guardian Dog Bark (5)
  • Guardian Dog Snarl (7)
  • Torch Loop
  • Winged Mount Call(4)
  • Winged Mount Fly Away (4)
